title: Leadership Practical Skill Enhancement: Convergence of Biology and Local Culture: Science with Digital Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can explain local traditional patterns and biological properties of natural dyes (e.g., plant pigment extraction, biological classification)
Students can create creative content linking local cultural elements with biological concepts (morphology, biodiversity) using digital tools
Students can demonstrate a 25%+ improvement in biology-related cognitive abilities through pre-post assessment comparisons

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
